name: Bridge Constructor Simulator
description: Bridge Constructor Simulator is a new game to download and best game among all other bridge construction games. May you have played many bridge constructor games but this one is the best bridge construction game due to its 3D game play environment and cool graphics. Use heavy and huge vehicles like dumper, roof tower crane, transporter tractor, loader truck and etc to construct bridges and other things. There are many challenging construction missions. You won’t even be safe from any accident in the multiple new levels of this simulator. In this construction of bridge simulator prove yourself as a master of bridge construction. Design a city road, home land to fullfill your river road construction mania. As a bridge builder take control of your bridge construction crane and start bridge construction and road making process. Multiple heavy bridge constructor trains and bridge constructor machines for bridge building are available in this game, you will experience a lot in this awesome game. Download now and have a great fun while constructing the bridges, buildings and many other things.
